verbs.description: sister of paul allen to [V: oversee] [ARG1: late billionaire estate] paul allen sister jody allen has been appointed to oversee the late billionaire estate and carry out the terms of his will the microsoft co - founder died oct 15 in seattle from complications of non - hodgkin lymphoma the 65-year - old was not married and did not have children his family said wednesday in a statement issued by a public relations firm that jody allen has been appointed executor and trustee of his estate according to his instructions jody allen who with her brother co - founded their 30-year - old paul g allen family foundation said she 'll do all she can to ensure her brother visions is realized for generations forbes recently estimated allen net worth at 20 3 billion portland trail blazers paul g allen family foundation estate seattle seahawks paul g allen family foundation seattle paul allen
